item.description:
It's May, which means it's officially Summer Blockbuster Season (remember when that used to start at Memorial Day?) The first big film of the year is Iron Man 3. It has the usual cast, plus Ben Kingsley as Iron Man's arch-nemesis The Mandarin.  What happened to Tony Stark after The Avengers? Are there lasting repercussions of his actions destroying the portal?  Did he enjoy the Shwarma?

Ben Kingsley is not Chinese, but he is Indian and a great actor, so I'll give him a pass.

Let's catch the 6:45 PM show at Showcase in Worcester.  We'll meet in the lobby at 6:15.  Anyone who wants to can join me for dinner and conversation afterwards.  If you need to reach me, my cell phone number is 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Iron Man 3 - Meet at 6:15 for 6:45 show
